column1: El Fahs (Arabic: الفحص‎) is a town and commune located in the Zaghouan Governorate
column4: 561.It is located in the Wadi Miliane valley
column6: in particular the Djebel Zaghouan. The Roman site of Thuburbo Majus is located 3 km away. Under the French protectorate
column7: the city was known as Pont du Fahs
column9: named after the remains of a Roman era bridge in the vicinity. The town was the site of a World War II battle during the Tunisia Campaign.
